author: scorpio22
title: Re: AFP to wage ‘all-out war’ vs Reds—Defense chief
text:
INQUIRER.net / 12:42 PM February 07, 2017 Defense Sec. Delfin Lorenzana. NOY MORCOSO/INQUIRER.net 
The Armed Forces of the Philippines (AFP) will launch an all-out war against the New People’s Army (NPA), the country’s Defense chief said on Tuesday. 
Defense Secretary Delfin Lorenzana said the NPA remains to be a “security threat” saying that state forces will “hunt them down.” 
“Yes, it’s an all-out war. Ano ba ang pinagkakaiba nila sa Abu Sayyaf (How different are they from the Abu Sayyaf)? They are there to terrorize people to get money. That’s extortion; we will hunt them down,” Lorenzana told reporters in a Palace brieifing. ADVERTISEMENT 
On Monday, President Rodrigo Duterte tagged the communist group as “terrorist,” saying he no longer believed they were a rebel organization. 
“From now on, I will consider the CPP-NPA-NDF (Communist Party of the Philippines-New People’s Army—National Democratic Front) a terrorist group,” Duterte said. 
The President earlier lifted the unilateral ceasefire with the communist rebels and terminated the peace talks. IDL
